plays.text: Penalty to Jason Demers 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct
Penalty to Darcy Tucker 2 minutes for Elbowing Jason Demers
Penalty to Jason Demers 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Scott Hannan
Bench penalty to Colorado 2 minutes for Too Many Men on the Ice(served by Chris Stewart)
Penalty to Jamie McGinn 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct John-Michael Liles
Penalty to John-Michael Liles 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct Jamie McGinn
Penalty to Ryan Stoa 2 minutes for Roughing Jamie McGinn
Penalty to Adam Foote 2 minutes for Tripping Ryane Clowe
Penalty to Kyle Quincey 2 minutes for Cross checking Logan Couture
Penalty to T.J. Galiardi 2 minutes for Boarding Devin Setoguchi
Goal scored by Ryan O'Reilly (Deflection 27 ft)
